div.p: SHEVAGURRY, a town of the south of India, in the district of Tinnevelly, a hundred miles north from Cape Comorin. Long. 77. 32. E. Lat. 9. 23. N.
,SHEVELPATORE, a town of the south of India, in tne province of the Carnatic, 110 miles north from Cape Comorin. Long. 77. 43. E. Lat. 9. 81. N.
